item.title: Fork app subtree was the solution to upload specific folder
item.description: Git was super difficult for me. # but it took the time to get used with, inevitably. The matter of fact is that I needed to upload public folder which is the projection for this hugo blog. When I just able to upload the publicfolder to the gh-pages only, during wrapping up all git changes, I was the only way to seperately manage the hugo blog well. the right way was subtree.
